title: Marrentill

properties.name: description
properties.value: Marrentill is the second lowest level herb. It can be cleaned at level 5 Herblore, giving 3.8 experience. It is used for making antipoison, marrentill tar and Guthix rest potions. Marrentill is also used to light incense burners, in player-owned houses, to boost Prayer experience when sacrificing bones (usually dragon bones).

Item ID251

Marrentill is the second lowest level herb. It can be cleaned at level 5 Herblore, giving 3.8 experience. It is used for making antipoison, marrentill tar and Guthix rest potions. Marrentill is also used to light incense burners, in player-owned houses, to boost Prayer experience when sacrificing bones (usually dragon bones).

Marrentill is rarely used for Herblore purposes. Guthix rests and marrentill tar have limited uses and demand among players, and antipoison requires unicorn horn dust as a secondary ingredient, which is costly, due to its use in superantipoison potions. As well as this, antipoison potions can be easily obtained from Jiminua's Jungle Store, further decreasing the demand. If you want to create a potion, you need to add the cleaned herb to a vial of water to create a marrentill potion (unf), and then add the secondary ingredient.

Marrentill, along with Guam leaves, is used in the Lunar Diplomacy quest to make Guam-marr vials for 84 experience per herb. The vial can then be destroyed and received again from Baba Yaga. Only a short trip to a nearby water source is required. This is a good way of getting rid of the low-level herbs for about 10k experience per hour.

According to the book Gielinor's flora - herbs, marrentill is often associated with purity and is believed to be a mistranslation of the word miryam, which is an ancient menaphite word meaning "sea of bitterness", referencing its extreme bitter taste.

Uses[edit | edit source]

Marrentill
Level required 1
Firemaking XP0 xp
FacilityBurners
TypeOther
Required toolTinderbox

Marrentill can be used to light burners in the Player-Owned House's Chapel room. This will boost the Prayer experience rates from offering bones at the altar an additive 50% for each lit burner. Other than that, it is used in Herblore in a few recipes.

Potion/item Level Second
Ingredient 		XP Effect/usage
Antipoison 5 Unicorn horn dust 37.5 Cures poison and gives 3 minutes of immunity to poison.
Guthix rest 18 Guam leaf x2
Harralander 		59 Reduces damage taken by poison by 1 hitpoint.
Heals 5 hitpoints.
Restores 5% run energy.
Marrentill tar 31 15 Swamp tar 42.5 Used as ammunition for orange salamanders.
Used as bait to lure orange salamanders.
